name: European Institute for Export Compliance
membership:
International member of ANSI - American National Standard Institute
EUNIFEC - European Universities Network for Export Compliance
goal:
EIFEC (European Institute for Export Compliance) is an organization participated by private / public institutions, universities, companies, authorities with the mission of promoting the the European (EU) EXPORT COMPLIANCE FRAMEWORK ( EU-ECF), which incorporates the best practice and principles for the industry and areas of import/export for EU organizations.
EIFEC has the mission to foster international security through managing and promoting the EU EXPORT COMPLIANCE FRAMEWORK (EU- ECF) which provides innovative solutions to the most critical challenges in a global marketplace.
EIFEC by strategic alliance with leading Academic Entities (EUNIFEC), promotes the culture of sound Export Compliance practice, and accredits third parties to perform and enhance Compliance professional activities.
interests: Competition, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Enterprise, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Public Health, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: International Trade Regulatory Framework, Sanctions, Taric and Customs, Dual Use, Common Foreign and Security Policy (CFSP)
